name: The Defender Cube (2018)
description:
WHAT CAN YOU EXPECT?

In this very simple, but surprisingly addictive game your objective is to defend your territory against never-ending waves of enemies. The concept of The Defender Cube is very simple, but don't be mistaken, the gameplay is challenging and requires skill! Try to survive as long as possible, destroy as many enemies as you can and beat your own highscore! 

-

PLEASE NOTE

This game is outdated (2018), so some basic functionality is missing and it might feel janky.
